Title: Swipe, Fuck, Leave
Writer: John Wells (developed for American television by), Paul Abbott (created by), Nancy Pimental, Dominique Morisseau (executive story editor)
Actors: William H. Macy, Emmy Rossum, Jeremy Allen White, Ethan Cutkosky
Plot: Frank, ready to disown his family, takes Liam under his wing and starts a new life barricaded on the top floor of the Gallagher home. Meanwhile, Fiona starts running Patsy's Pies on her own...
